verses.verse: When thou sittest <WH3427> <WH8799> to eat <WH3898> <WH8800> with a ruler <WH4910> <WH8802>, consider <WH995> <WH8799> diligently <WH995> <WH8800> what is before <WH6440> thee:
And put <WH7760> <WH8804> a knife <WH7915> to thy throat <WH3930>, if thou be a man given <WH1167> to appetite <WH5315>.
Be not desirous <WH183> <WH8691> of his dainties <WH4303>: for they are deceitful <WH3577> meat <WH3899>.
Labour <WH3021> <WH8799> not to be rich <WH6238> <WH8687>: cease <WH2308> <WH8798> from thine own wisdom <WH998>.

Wilt thou set <WH5774> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH5774> <WH8799> thine eyes <WH5869> upon that which is not? for riches certainly <WH6213> <WH8800> make <WH6213> <WH8799> themselves wings <WH3671>; they fly away <WH5774> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH5774> <WH8687> as an eagle <WH5404> toward heaven <WH8064>.
Eat <WH3898> <WH8799> thou not the bread <WH3899> of him that hath an evil <WH7451> eye <WH5869>, neither desire <WH183> <WH8691> thou his dainty meats <WH4303>:
For as he thinketh <WH8176> <WH8804> in his heart <WH5315>, so is he: Eat <WH398> <WH8798> and drink <WH8354> <WH8798>, saith <WH559> <WH8799> he to thee; but his heart <WH3820> is not with thee.
The morsel <WH6595> which thou hast eaten <WH398> <WH8804> shalt thou vomit up <WH6958> <WH8686>, and lose <WH7843> <WH8765> thy sweet <WH5273> words <WH1697>.
Speak <WH1696> <WH8762> not in the ears <WH241> of a fool <WH3684>: for he will despise <WH936> <WH8799> the wisdom <WH7922> of thy words <WH4405>.
Remove <WH5253> <WH8686> not the old <WH5769> landmark <WH1366>; and enter <WH935> <WH8799> not into the fields <WH7704> of the fatherless <WH3490>:
For their redeemer <WH1350> <WH8802> is mighty <WH2389>; he shall plead <WH7378> <WH8799> their cause <WH7379> with thee.
Apply <WH935> <WH8685> thine heart <WH3820> unto instruction <WH4148>, and thine ears <WH241> to the words <WH561> of knowledge <WH1847>.
Withhold <WH4513> <WH8799> not correction <WH4148> from the child <WH5288>: for if thou beatest <WH5221> <WH8686> him with the rod <WH7626>, he shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt beat <WH5221> <WH8686> him with the rod <WH7626>, and shalt deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> his soul <WH5315> from SH'ol <WH7585>.
My son <WH1121>, if thine heart <WH3820> be wise <WH2449> <WH8804>, my heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>, even mine <WH589>.
Yea, my reins <WH3629> shall rejoice <WH5937> <WH8799>, when thy lips <WH8193> speak <WH1696> <WH8763> right things <WH4339>.
Let not thine heart <WH3820> envy <WH7065> <WH8762> sinners <WH2400>: but be thou in the fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068> all the day <WH3117> long.
For surely there is <WH3426> an end <WH319>; and thine expectation <WH8615> shall not be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> thou, my son <WH1121>, and be wise <WH2449> <WH8798>, and guide <WH833> <WH8761> thine heart <WH3820> in the way <WH1870>.
Be not among winebibbers <WH3196> <WH5433> <WH8802>; among riotous eaters <WH2151> <WH8802> of flesh <WH1320>:
For the drunkard <WH5433> <WH8802> and the glutton <WH2151> <WH8802> shall come to poverty <WH3423> <WH8735>: and drowsiness <WH5124> shall clothe <WH3847> <WH8686> a man with rags <WH7168>.
Hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto thy father <WH1> that begat <WH3205> <WH8804> thee, and despise <WH936> <WH8799> not thy mother <WH517> when she is old <WH2204> <WH8804>.
Buy <WH7069> <WH8798> the truth <WH571>, and sell <WH4376> <WH8799> it not; also wisdom <WH2451>, and instruction <WH4148>, and understanding <WH998>.
The father <WH1> of the righteous <WH6662> shall greatly <WH1524> rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>: and he that begetteth <WH3205> <WH8802> a wise <WH2450> child shall have joy <WH8055> <WH8799> of him.
Thy father <WH1> and thy mother <WH517> shall be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>, and she that bare <WH3205> <WH8802> thee shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>.
My son <WH1121>, give <WH5414> <WH8798> me thine heart <WH3820>, and let thine eyes <WH5869> observe <WH7521> <WH8799> <WH5341> <WH8799> my ways <WH1870>.
For a whore <WH2181> <WH8802> is a deep <WH6013> ditch <WH7745>; and a strange woman <WH5237> is a narrow <WH6862> pit <WH875>.
She also lieth in wait <WH693> <WH8799> as for a prey <WH2863>, and increaseht <WH3254> <WH8686> the transgressors <WH898> <WH8802> among men <WH120>.

Who hath woe <WH188>? who hath sorrow <WH17>? who hath contentions <WH4079> <WH8675> <WH4066>? who hath babbling <WH7879>? who hath wounds <WH6482> without cause <WH2600>? who hath redness <WH2448> of eyes <WH5869> ?
They that tarry long <WH309> <WH8764> at the wine <WH3196>; they that go <WH935> <WH8802> to seek <WH2713> <WH8800> mixed wine <WH4469>.

Look <WH7200> <WH8799> not thou upon the wine <WH3196> when it is red <WH119> <WH8691>, when it giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> his colour <WH5869> in the cup <WH3563> <WH8675> <WH3599>, when it moveth <WH1980> <WH8691> itself aright <WH4339>.
At the last <WH319> it biteth <WH5391> <WH8799> like a serpent <WH5175>, and stingeth <WH6567> <WH8686> like an adder <WH6848>.
Thine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> <WH8799> strange women <WH2114> <WH8801>, and thine heart <WH3820> shall utter <WH1696> <WH8762> perverse things <WH8419>.
Yea, thou shalt be as he that lieth down <WH7901> <WH8802> in the midst <WH3820> of the sea <WH3220>, or as he that lieth <WH7901> <WH8802> upon the top <WH7218> of a mast <WH2260>.

They have stricken <WH5221> <WH8689> me, shalt thou say, and I was not sick <WH2470> <WH8804>; they have beaten <WH1986> <WH8804> me, and I felt <WH3045> <WH8804> it not: when shall I awake <WH6974> <WH8686>? I will seek <WH1245> <WH8762> it yet <WH3254> <WH8686> again.
